================
## Government Tender Announcement

### Request for Expression of Interest (RFEOI) for Construct Transition Centre

#### Reference Information
* Reference Number: MX-42909752402
* Solicitation Number: NRO2006_RFEOI
* Publication Date: 2023-10-27
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-11-14 13:00:00

### Overview
The Canadian Department of National Defence requires a builder to design, construct, and hand over a new Transition Centre at 5th Canadian Division Support Base Gagetown. This Request for Expression of Interest (RFEOI) is the first step in a two-step solicitation process to find the suitable contractor.

### Project Summary
The Transition Centre is a facility intended to provide support to all members of the Canadian Armed Forces, regular and reserve forces, in New Brunswick and Prince Edward Island. The building will house approximately 64 personnel with a maximum of 25 visitors/clients. The facility will accommodate workspaces, reception areas, and specialty counselling and therapy spaces, aiming to achieve LEED Silver or Green Globes (2 Globes) Certification.

### Scope of Work
The scope of work includes the design, construction, equipment installation, and furnishing of the Transition Centre. The project involves a single-storey, barrier-free building with total gross floor area of 1537 m2. The construction will be led by a general contractor.

### Requirements and Evaluation Criteria
This RFEOI is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA). The contractor must have a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by Public Works and Government Services Canada. The evaluation criteria will be outlined in the tender documents during the next phase.

### Procedure
Applicants must register in the Electronic Bidding System (EBS) to access the tender documents, which include a Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA) that must be signed before access to the tender is granted. The bid submission will be through the EBS. Questions and requests for clarification must be submitted in writing via the EBS.
